data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 1, Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Juan Agudelo.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Atlanta go level at 1-1 through Jon Gallagher in Atlanta.
That's a fine assist from George Bello.
In the minute 7, Jair Marrufo blows against Atlanta's Matheus Rossetto for offside.
Miami to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
Brek Shea scores with a header and the away team now lead 1-2.
Rodolfo Pizarro instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 13, Atlanta are caught offside.
Throw-in Atlanta.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
In the minute 15, Free kick Miami.
Adam Jahn for Atlanta drives towards goal at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
Franco Escobar (Atlanta) gets a yellow card.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Miami, close to Atlanta's area.
In Atlanta, Miami push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Jair Marrufo signals a Miami throw-in in Atlanta's half.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Miami.
In the minute 25, Atlanta needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Rodolfo Pizarro (Miami) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Atlanta defenders.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Miami at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rodolfo Pizarro (Miami) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 28, Miami drive upfield and Lewis Morgan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in high up the field for Miami in Atlanta.
In the minute 30, Jair Marrufo signals a Miami throw-in in Atlanta's half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
At Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Miami are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 31, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jon Gallagher of Atlanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Miami.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 35, Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
Miami have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 36, Rodolfo Pizarro (Miami) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
Jeff Larentowicz is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 39, Important block from the Atlanta defence as Brek Shea fires in a strike for Miami.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 41, Atlanta pushes forward through Adam Jahn, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jeff Larentowicz returns to the field for Atlanta after picking up a slight injury.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
In the minute 43, Atlanta are pushing forward but George Bello's finish is wide of the goal.
Jair Marrufo awards Miami a goal kick.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 45, Miami drive forward but Victor Ulloa is judged offside.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Atlanta.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Miami push forward at Mercedes-Benz Stadium and Blaise Matuidi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlanta defence.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Blaise Matuidi (Miami) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 51, Miami have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a Miami throw-in in Atlanta's half.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Throw-in Miami.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Miami to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
In the minute 56, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Ben Sweat for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlanta's half?
In the minute 59, Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
Brooks Lennon is replacing Jake Mulraney for the home team.
Atlanta make their second substitution with Erick Torres replacing Adam Jahn.
In the minute 62, Free kick Atlanta.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 65, Miami's Brek Shea misses with an attempt on goal.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Atlanta!
In the minute 66, At Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Andres Reyes has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Atlanta's Anton Walkes breaks free at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Miami at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Dylan Nealis is on a sub for Nicolas Figal for Miami.
In Atlanta, Erick Torres (Atlanta) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 69, Atlanta push upfield but Jair Marrufo quickly pulls them for offside.
The home team replace Eric Remedi with Emerson Hyndman.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
The match at Mercedes-Benz Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jon Gallagher, who is down injured.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Miami.
In the minute 75, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Miami.
It seems as if Jon Gallagher is unable to continue. Manuel Castro replaces him for the home team.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Wil Trapp is on a sub for Rodolfo Pizarro for Miami.
Atlanta needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
In the minute 80, Jon Gallagher is back on the pitch.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
In the minute 83, Atlanta are whistled for offside.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jair Marrufo signals a Atlanta throw-in in Miami's half.
In the minute 89, Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Atlanta, close to Miami's area.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Atlanta's Emerson Hyndman gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Miami defender.
Can Atlanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Miami's half?
Throw-in Miami.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atlanta will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Miami.
Throw-in high up the field for Miami in Atlanta.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a third substitution, with Roman Torres replacing Lewis Morgan.
Matias Pellegrini is replacing Brek Shea for the away team.
Miami's Luis Robles has been booked in Atlanta.
